tables.name: dydx_balance_module_account
tables.description: This table provides a daily snapshot of account balances in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains the address, denomination, and amount of each account at a specific day.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day of the balance snapshot in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The address of the account in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: denom
columns.description: The denomination of the cryptocurrency (e.g., uatom, uosmo, etc.)

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The balance of the account in the specified denomination.

tables.name: dydx_block_events
tables.description: Cosmos blockchain block events data, providing insights into the distributed ledger activity across the ecosystem. This table captures key metrics and timestamps from various blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, representing the number of blocks mined.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: A unique index for each event within a block, used to track the sequence of events.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred within the block, e.g., a transaction or a smart contract execution.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event, providing more context about the event's specifics.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The Cosmos blockchain or network that the event originated from.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block event data was ingested into the system, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version number of the schema used to parse the block event data.

tables.name: dydx_blocks
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive overview of blocks from the Cosmos ecosystem, containing essential details about each block's metadata. It offers valuable insights for understanding block production and validation within the Cosmos network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The sequential height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was produced by the validator.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for production.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash representing the active validators participating in the network.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total bytes of messages included within the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions included within the block.

tables.name: dydx_cancel_order
tables.description: This table contains information about cancelled orders in the Cosmos ecosystem, enabling insights into market dynamics and user behavior. The data provides a comprehensive view of order cancellations, facilitating analysis and decision-making.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the order cancellation occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the order cancellation occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the sender, if any.

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the cancelled order.

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: The identifier of the market in which the order was cancelled.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of order that was cancelled.

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the order was scheduled to expire.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_delegate
tables.description: This table contains the blockchain data related to the Delegators of the Cosmos network. It includes information about the transactions and events related to the delegation process.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that sent the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The address of the validator associated with the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares of the delegator.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_deposit
tables.description: This table contains data about deposits made on the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the movement of assets within the network. It offers a detailed view of transactional activity, enabling analysis of user behavior and network dynamics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the deposit transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block where the deposit transaction was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hash identifying the deposit transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the deposit transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message (or transaction) within the block.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action (or operation) within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated the deposit transaction.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: Address of the account receiving the deposited assets.

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: Sub-account of the recipient address, if applicable.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: Amount of assets deposited, represented in the native unit of the asset.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the asset being deposited, typically a denomination of a Cosmos SDK-based asset.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_match
tables.description: This table provides a record of trades and order activity on the DyDx platform, capturing key details of each interaction within the Cosmos-based blockchain ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the trade or order activity was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was mined or validated.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction in which the trade or order activity was recorded.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: taker
columns.description: The party that initiated the trade or order activity, typically the buyer or seller.

columns.name: taker_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the taker party.

columns.name: taker_order_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the taker's order.

columns.name: maker
columns.description: The party that received the trade or order activity, typically the counterparty.

columns.name: maker_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the maker party.

columns.name: maker_order_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the maker's order.

columns.name: taker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: The fees paid by the taker in quote currency.

columns.name: maker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: The fees paid by the maker in quote currency.

columns.name: maker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the maker's quote balance.

columns.name: taker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the taker's quote balance.

columns.name: maker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: The change in the maker's perpetual quantums in base currency.

columns.name: taker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: The change in the taker's perpetual quantums in base currency.

columns.name: insurance_fund_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the insurance fund's balance in quote currency.

columns.name: is_liquidation
columns.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the trade or order activity was a liquidation.

columns.name: is_deleverage
columns.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the trade or order activity was a deleverage.

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the perpetual trade or order activity.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_mempool_transactions
tables.description: This table contains information about mempool transactions on the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. It provides a real- time snapshot of unconfirmed transactions awaiting inclusion in the blockchain.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: Metadata associated with the transaction, including attributes such as sender, recipient, and transaction type.

columns.name: publish_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was published to the mempool.

columns.name: message_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction message.

columns.name: subscription_name
columns.description: Name of the subscription that published the transaction.

columns.name: data
columns.description: Raw transaction data in JSON format, including details about the transaction such as amount, fee, and gas limit.

tables.name: dydx_message_events
tables.description: This table contains events from the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, specifically related to transactions and block data. It provides a comprehensive view of the blockchain activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the event occurred, in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that triggered the event.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message that triggered the event.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, such as a transaction or block event.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes of the event, including any relevant data or metadata.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the event data was ingested into the system, in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the event data.

tables.name: dydx_message_senders
tables.description: This table contains information about the senders of messages in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides data on block heights, timestamps, and the actions performed by these senders.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message was sent.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the message was sent.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of the transaction that included the message.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the message.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The action performed by the sender, such as a smart contract invocation.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_message_types_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transactions from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the message types and related transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_place_order
tables.description: This table contains information about Dydx place order events. It captures key details about each order placement in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the order was placed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the order was placed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that included the order placement.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that placed the order.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the sender (if applicable).

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the order.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The quantity of the asset being ordered.

columns.name: subticks
columns.description: The quantity of the asset being ordered in sub-tick units.

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: The ID of the market in which the order was placed.

columns.name: direction
columns.description: The direction of the order (e.g., buy or sell).

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of order (e.g., limit or market).

columns.name: trigger_condition
columns.description: The condition under which the order is triggered (if applicable).

columns.name: trigger_subticks
columns.description: The sub- tick units at which the order is triggered (if applicable).

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with the order.

columns.name: reduce_only
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the order is reduce- only.

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the order expires (if applicable).

columns.name: on_expiration
columns.description: The action to take when the order expires (if applicable).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the order data was ingested.

tables.name: dydx_settled_funding
tables.description: This table provides settled funding data for perpetual contracts on the Cosmos-based DyDX exchange. It captures key metrics for each funding event.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height in the Cosmos blockchain at which the funding event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the funding event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifying the transaction that included the funding event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block that included the funding event.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that included the funding event.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that included the funding event.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the funding event.

columns.name: subaccount_number
columns.description: The subaccount number associated with the funding event.

columns.name: funding_paid_quote_quantums
columns.description: The amount of quote currency paid in funding for the perpetual contract.

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the perpetual contract involved in the funding event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the funding event data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_state
tables.description: This table provides a snapshot of the state of the Dydx protocol on the cosmos blockchain, including its current status and value. The data is sourced from the blockchain and reflects the state at a specific block height.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the Dydx state, representing the protocol's current configuration.

columns.name: block
columns.description: The block height at which the Dydx state was recorded.

columns.name: block_time
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the Dydx state was recorded.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: A boolean indicating whether the Dydx state has been deleted or not.

columns.name: val
columns.description: The current value of the Dydx protocol on the cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the Dydx state data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: dydx_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Data. This table contains information about transactions that occurred on various Cosmos blockchain chains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the Cosmos blockchain chain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: The log message associated with the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: The memo associated with the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The code associated with the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The schema version of the transaction data.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the permission to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be used by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Whether the transaction was executed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: The JSON data associated with multi-sign transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction times out.

tables.name: dydx_transfer
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive record of all transfer events on the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains, providing valuable insights into the flow of assets and transactions across the network. It captures every transfer event, enabling in-depth analysis and tracking of asset movements.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the transfer event was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that initiated the transfer event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer event within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message that triggered the transfer event.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that initiated the transfer event.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transfer.

columns.name: sender_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the sender, if applicable.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the account that received the transferred assets.

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the recipient, if applicable.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The quantity of assets transferred during the event.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the asset that was transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer event was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a collection of messages related to transactions on Cosmos- based blockchains, providing insights into the blockchain's activities and events.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Cosmos chain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction in which the message was included.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The position of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The position of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message (e.g., contract execution, transfer, etc.).

columns.name: message
columns.description: The specific details of the message, including the data being transferred or executed.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the Cosmos SDK schema used to validate and process the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the message was ingested into the datasource.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined.

tables.name: dydx_undelegate
tables.description: This table contains information about DYDX tokens undelegated from validators in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a detailed record of the undelegation events that have occurred.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the undelegation transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the undelegation transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the undelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block that initiated the undelegation.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that initiated the undelegation.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that initiated the undelegation.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the undelegation.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that was undelegated from.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of DYDX tokens that were undelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the DYDX tokens that were undelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_validators
tables.description: This table contains information about active validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into their performance, settings, and participation in the network. Validators are crucial for maintaining the integrity and security of the blockchain.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: The address of the validator's operator account.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: The address of the validator's account.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: The public key used for consensus in the validator's proof of stake algorithm.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Indicates whether the validator has been flagged as 'jailed' due to misbehavior, preventing it from participating in the network.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the validator, such as 'BOND_STATUS_UNBONDED', 'BOND_STATUS_UNBONDING', or 'BOND_STATUS_BONDED'.

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: The number of tokens staked by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human-readable name of the validator, used for identification.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The public key or other identifier of the validator's identity.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The URL of the validator's website or contact information.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: The contact information of the validator's security team.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details about the validator, such as its hardware or software configuration.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the validator will be unbonded.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: The time at which the validator will be unbonded.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: The current commission rate of the validator, expressed as a percentage.

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: The maximum commission rate allowed for the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: The rate at which the validator's commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: The time at which the validator's commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: The minimum amount of tokens that must be self-delegated to the validator.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: The time at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: dydx_vote
tables.description: This table provides information on voting events in the Cosmos ecosystem, specifically related to DYDX proposals. It contains data about the proposals, their options, and the voting activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the voting event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction where the voting event was recorded.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the voting event.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the proposal being voted on.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The option chosen by the sender in the voting event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_withdrawal
tables.description: This table contains information about withdrawals from the DyDx protocol on the cosmos ecosystem, providing a snapshot of on-chain transactions and their associated details.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the withdrawal transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier for the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal action within the transaction message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The wallet address that initiated the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: sender_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the sender wallet address.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The wallet address that received the withdrawn assets.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The amount of assets withdrawn, represented in quantum units.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the asset withdrawn.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal transaction data was ingested into the system.
